title: kELo gOpisabEDa
sahitya:
kELo gOpisabEDa hELidare balavilla hELalanjuvenu ninna 
bALa baLagaLella pAlisu abhISTavanu vyALagiri vEnkaTEsha Isha


caraNam 1    tale hoDaka hiriya maga dharege pUjitanalla balu bhaNDa giriya maganu 
lalane lObhigaLa mane nelasihaLu sose tAnu holeya kulavariyadavaLu
    caraNam 2    magaLa mArgavu Donku maiduna guru drOhi mommaganu balu jADighOra 
hagaraNaga nIyenjala haNNannu meddu mUjagadoDeyanenisi mereda tiride
    caraNam 3    halavangadavanendu AdalEtake kuDute pAla saviduNDaranna 
nelege silukada nInu purandara viTTalane salahi dAsana mADide biDade
